mangaData.name: One Piece
mangaData.description: A series that follows the story of Monkey D. Luffy on his journey to becoming King of the Pirates, written and illustrated by Eiichiro Oca.
mangaData.author: Eichiro Oda

mangaData.name: Bleach
mangaData.description: A series based around Soul Reapers and the demons they face, and how our protagonist Ichigo Kurosaki gets caught up in it, written and illustrated by Tito Kubo.
mangaData.author: Tite Kubo

mangaData.name: Naruto
mangaData.description: A story that follows a young boy Naruto Uzumaki, and his rise to becoming the Hokage of his village, written and illustrated by Masashi Kishimoto.
mangaData.author: Masashi Kishimoto

mangaData.name: Attack on Titan
mangaData.description: Set in a world where humanity lives inside cities surrounded by three enormous walls that protect them from the gigantic man-eating humanoids referred to as Titans, written and illustrated by Hajime Isayama.
mangaData.author: Hajime Isayama

mangaData.name: Seven Deadly Sins
mangaData.description: In a setting similar to European Middle Ages, the seven deadly sins are a notorious group that are wanted dead or alive, written and illustrated by Nakaba Suzuki.
mangaData.author: Nakaba Suzuki

mangaData.name: Jujutsu Kaisen
mangaData.description: The story follows high school student Yuji Itadori as he joins a secret organization of Jujutsu Sorcerers in order to kill a powerful Curse named Ryomen Sukuna, of whom Yuji becomes the host. Written and directed by Gege Akutami.
mangaData.author: Gege Akutami

mangaData.name: Black Clover
mangaData.description: The story follows Asta, a young boy born without any magic power. This is unknown to the world he lives in because seemingly everyone has some sort of magic power. written and illustrated by Yuki Tabata.
mangaData.author: Yuki Tabata

mangaData.name: My Hero Academia
mangaData.description: The story follows Izuku Midoriya, a boy born without superpowers in in a world where they have become commonplace, but who still dreams of becoming a superhero himself. Written and illustrated by Kohei Horikoshi.
mangaData.author: Kohei Horikoshi

mangaData.name: Kaiju No 8
mangaData.description: In a Japan that gets regularly attack by monsters known as Kaijus, Kafka Hibino with dreams of joining the defense force to protect people, one day finds he becomes one himself. Written and illustrated by Naoya Matsumoto.
mangaData.author: Matsumoto Naoya

mangaData.name: Fairy Tail
mangaData.description: The story follows the adventures of Natsu Dragneel a member fo the popular wizard guild Fairy Tail. Written and illustrated by Hiro Mashima.
mangaData.author: Hiro Mashima

mangaData.name: Soul Eater
mangaData.description: Set at the Death Weapon Meister Academy, the series revolves around three teams, each consisting of a weapon meister and (at least one) weapon that can transform into a humanoid.
mangaData.author: Atsushi Okubo

mangaData.name: Boruto
mangaData.description: A spinoff and sequel to Kisimoto's Naruto, it follow the exploits of Boruto Uzumaki and his ninja team.
mangaData.author: Masashi Kishimoto

mangaData.name: Dandadan
mangaData.description: Momo Ayase is a high school girl who believes in ghosts but not aliens, while her classmate Okarun believes in aliens but not ghosts.
mangaData.author: Yukinobu Tatsu

mangaData.name: Solo Leveling
mangaData.description: A boy with no skill or power suddenly gets the power of a "player" and now has the ability to level up.
mangaData.author: Chugong
